function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through shared virtual reality equipment","Impact":"Increased risk of infection for users of shared VR equipment","Mitigation":"Regular sanitization of VR equipment, use of disposable covers, and limitation of shared usage","Technologies":"UV-C light sanitization, antimicrobial materials for equipment, touchless interfaces","People":"Users of shared VR equipment, medical practitioners, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, VR system manufacturers"},{"Description":"Lack of awareness or adherence to hygiene protocols in virtual reality environments","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission of contagious diseases in virtual reality environments","Mitigation":"Education and enforcement of hygiene protocols, regular training and reminders for users","Technologies":"Interactive virtual reality training modules on hygiene, real-time monitoring of user adherence to protocols","People":"Users of virtual reality environments, medical practitioners, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, VR system manufacturers"},{"Description":"Inadequate simulation of real-life infectious disease scenarios in virtual reality training","Impact":"Limited preparedness of medical professionals to handle real-life infectious disease cases","Mitigation":"Development of realistic and diverse virtual reality scenarios, integration of real-time data and scenarios, feedback mechanisms for performance improvement","Technologies":"Real-time data integration, scenario generation algorithms, performance tracking and feedback systems","People":"Medical practitioners, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, VR system developers"}]}
